viewData.name: Phi Scalp Caliper
viewData.short_description: Phi scalp caliper is a fundamental tool used in the scalp micropigmentation process, which allows us to draw the main guideline of the head achieving maximum symmetry and therefore the best possible result for every single client.
viewData.long_description: By using this tool with the help of creating reference points we can measure both sides exactly in order to get the symmetry line and desired form in which later we will work with, to create the best look for the particular client. Easy to use and maintain tool, with maximum precision and accuracy.
